doc.field: Correspondence, reports, publications, and clippings related to child labor, rent control, prison reform, sweatshops, New York Labor Religion Coalition, health care, labor unions, senior citizens, Transport Workers Union (TWU) Local 100, City University of New York (CUNY), State University of New York (SUNY), election reform, the death penalty, and oil drilling in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.
